dublin_core.dcvalue: This paper lays out a strategic framework to help global health specialists implementers and policy makers working to achieve MDGs 4 and 5 conceptualize how mobile phone technology can be used to improve MNCH The framework is an overarching conceptual model for promoting and using mHealth for MNCH from which workplans and results frameworks can be developed Why it helps with planning Lays out how mHealth can be applied in MNCH programs and aligns with the MDGs Highlights guiding principles operational priorities illustrative outcomes and potential stakeholders for consideration during the planning process
Leveraging Mobile Technologies for Maternal, Newborn & Child Health: A Framework for Engagement
Leveraging Mobile Technologies for Maternal, Newborn & Child Health: A Framework for Engagement
